name: Toddler Lattice Beanie
description:
This hand crocheted hat is made from a soft, 100% acrylic yarn.  

This hat fits 2T-4T girls.

This hat can be made in other colors and sizes. Contact me for more information.

Care: 
Hand wash in warm water. Do not heavily scrub. Do not wring dry. Lay flat to dry.

Note: 
Monitor resolution, photo lighting, and dye lots may create a slightly different shade of yarn than what is pictured.

name: Girls Visor Beanie
description:
This hand crocheted hat is made from a soft, chunky blend of 20% wool 80% acrylic yarn.  

The flower is detachable. It can also be worn as a broach or pinned to a ponytail band. 

This hat fits s/m girls or pre-teens. 

This hat and flower can be made in other colors and sizes. Contact me for more information.

Care: 
Hand wash in warm water. Do not heavily scrub. Do not wring dry. Lay flat to dry.

Note: 
Monitor resolution, photo lighting, and dye lots may create a slightly different shade of yarn than what is pictured.

name: Green Lattice Beanie
description:
This hand crocheted hat is made from a soft, Wool Blend yarn.

This hat fits 24Months - 3T girls.

This hat and flower can be made in different colors and sizes. Convo me for more information.

Care:
Hand wash in warm water. Do not scrub or wring dry. Lay flat to dry.

Please Note:
Dye lots, monitor resolution, and lighting, may create a slightly different shade of yarn than what is pictured.

name: Ribbon Wands - Cowboy Party Pack
description:
Ribbon Wands are great for working on range of motion, eye-tracking skills and enhancing any musical activity.

The Cowboy Party Pack Ribbon Wands have Red Bandanna and Cow/Brown Satin ribbon attached to a 12" long wooden finished wand with a swivel end to prevent tangling.

Each Wand has a little Cow Bell attached to the swivel.

Perfect for Birthday Parties, Group Play and/or Party Favors.

Edges of ribbon are finished so they don't fray.

Have fun with a Ribbon Wand! Use them for dancing, play, or any free expression with or without music!

For Safety reasons, Ribbon Wands are not intended for children under 12 years old.

name: Pink Garden Fairy Tutu
description:
This Tutu was specially made for all those Garden Fairies who love to dance in the flowers under the sun's sparkling rays!

Made from Shimmering Pink Tulle and filled with Pink-Tipped White Flowers, and Green Leaves. The Elastic Waistband measures roughly 16 inches (elastic will stretch to 40 inches), but has a Pink Satin Ribbon Drawstring for little Fairy Princesses with smaller waists. This makes it easy to fit from 6 months to 10 years!

Make it even more fun and get a Ribbon Wand to match!


If you are an International Buyer OUTSIDE the United States, contact me for Shipping Charges.
